name: Light Shinobi
description:
The Light Shinobi's world has been infested by the minions of the evil one. Minds of fellow shinobi have been brainwashed and they now serve the one that lurks in the shadows.

Help the Light Shinobi rid the world of the darkness of the evil one.

Soundtrack by Azaki Music:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCH2Ux0pvaCqmawKjzpCNlBg
